abstract: Pregnancy in 424 women with uterine fibroids is featured with elevated prolactin and progesterone in the 3rd trimester, and monoton elevation of cortisol in all trimesters. Recommendations on supplementary estrogen therapy are discussed.
title: Matevosyan NR, Bournazyan RA. Curves of serum FSH, prolactin, oestradiol, progesterone, testosterone, and cortisol in pregnancy with uterine fibroids.
subject: law
